column5: Hi all,  Jack got into his first big ski.
Great video Simon but when I saw your thread title I thought maybe Jack got a BIG musky thru the ice LOL
Great stuff Simon.  It's great to teach them when they're young and watch them learn and get better.  Looks like Jack's having a wonderful time!
Great video Simon but when I saw your thread title I thought maybe Jack got a BIG musky thru the ice LOL
GREAT stuff Simon... the perfect age to start and he looks like a natural. Would have loved him in one of my classes, at Calabogie back in the day..
